metrics.name: scanners_expired
metrics.label: Scanners Expired
metrics.description: Number of scanners that have expired since service start

metrics.name: scanner_duration
metrics.label: Scanner Duration
metrics.description: Histogram of the duration of active scanners on this tablet.

metrics.name: active_scanners
metrics.label: Active Scanners
metrics.description: Number of scanners that are currently active

metrics.name: op_apply_queue_length
metrics.label: Operation Apply Queue Length
metrics.description: Number of operations waiting to be applied to the tablet. High queue lengths indicate that the server is unable to process operations as fast as they are being written to the WAL.

metrics.name: op_apply_queue_time
metrics.label: Operation Apply Queue Time
metrics.description: Time that operations spent waiting in the apply queue before being processed. High queue times indicate that the server is unable to process operations as fast as they are being written to the WAL.

metrics.name: op_apply_run_time
metrics.label: Operation Apply Run Time
metrics.description: Time that operations spent being applied to the tablet. High values may indicate that the server is under-provisioned or that operations consist of very large batches.

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_tserver_TabletServerService_Ping
metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerService.Ping RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletServerService.Ping() RPC requests

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerService.ScannerKeepAlive RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerService.ListTablets RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerService.Checksum RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.BeginTabletCopySession RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.CheckSessionActive RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.CheckSessionActive() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_tserver_TabletCopyService_FetchData
metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.FetchData RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.FetchData() RPC requests

metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletCopyService.EndTabletCopySession RPC Time

metrics.name: glog_info_messages
metrics.label: INFO-level Log Messages
metrics.description: Number of INFO-level log messages emitted by the application.

metrics.name: glog_warning_messages
metrics.label: WARNING-level Log Messages
metrics.description: Number of WARNING-level log messages emitted by the application.

metrics.name: glog_error_messages
metrics.label: ERROR-level Log Messages
metrics.description: Number of ERROR-level log messages emitted by the application.

metrics.name: generic_current_allocated_bytes
metrics.label: Heap Memory Usage
metrics.description: Number of bytes used by the application. This will not typically match the memory use reported by the OS, because it does not include TCMalloc overhead or memory fragmentation.

metrics.name: generic_heap_size
metrics.label: Reserved Heap Memory
metrics.description: Bytes of system memory reserved by TCMalloc.

metrics.name: tcmalloc_pageheap_free_bytes
metrics.label: Free Heap Memory
metrics.description: Number of bytes in free, mapped pages in page heap. These bytes can be used to fulfill allocation requests. They always count towards virtual memory usage, and unless the underlying memory is swapped out by the OS, they also count towards physical memory usage.

metrics.name: tcmalloc_pageheap_unmapped_bytes
metrics.label: Unmapped Heap Memory
metrics.description: Number of bytes in free, unmapped pages in page heap. These are bytes that have been released back to the OS, possibly by one of the MallocExtension "Release" calls. They can be used to fulfill allocation requests, but typically incur a page fault. They always count towards virtual memory usage, and depending on the OS, typically do not count towards physical memory usage.

metrics.name: tcmalloc_max_total_thread_cache_bytes
metrics.label: Thread Cache Memory Limit
metrics.description: A limit to how much memory TCMalloc dedicates for small objects. Higher numbers trade off more memory use for -- in some situations -- improved efficiency.

metrics.name: tcmalloc_current_total_thread_cache_bytes
metrics.label: Thread Cache Memory Usage
metrics.description: A measure of some of the memory TCMalloc is using (for small objects).

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_server_GenericService_SetFlag
metrics.label: kudu.server.GenericService.SetFlag RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.server.GenericService.SetFlag() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_server_GenericService_FlushCoverage
metrics.label: kudu.server.GenericService.FlushCoverage RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.server.GenericService.FlushCoverage() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_server_GenericService_ServerClock
metrics.label: kudu.server.GenericService.ServerClock RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.server.GenericService.ServerClock() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_server_GenericService_SetServerWallClockForTests
metrics.label: kudu.server.GenericService.SetServerWallClockForTests RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.server.GenericService.SetServerWallClockForTests() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_server_GenericService_GetStatus
metrics.label: kudu.server.GenericService.GetStatus RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.server.GenericService.GetStatus() RPC requests

metrics.name: memrowset_size
metrics.label: MemRowSet Memory Usage
metrics.description: Size of this tablet's memrowset

metrics.name: on_disk_size
metrics.label: Tablet Size On Disk
metrics.description: Size of this tablet on disk.

metrics.name: rows_inserted
metrics.label: Rows Inserted
metrics.description: Number of rows inserted into this tablet since service start

metrics.name: rows_upserted
metrics.label: Rows Upserted
metrics.description: Number of rows upserted into this tablet since service start

metrics.name: rows_updated
metrics.label: Rows Updated
metrics.description: Number of row update operations performed on this tablet since service start

metrics.name: rows_deleted
metrics.label: Rows Deleted
metrics.description: Number of row delete operations performed on this tablet since service start

metrics.name: scanner_rows_returned
metrics.label: Scanner Rows Returned
metrics.description: Number of rows returned by scanners to clients. This count is measured after predicates are applied, and thus is not a reflection of the amount of work being done by scanners.

metrics.name: scanner_cells_returned
metrics.label: Scanner Cells Returned
metrics.description: Number of table cells returned by scanners to clients. This count is measured after predicates are applied, and thus is not a reflection of the amount of work being done by scanners.

metrics.name: scanner_bytes_returned
metrics.label: Scanner Bytes Returned
metrics.description: Number of bytes returned by scanners to clients. This count is measured after predicates are applied and the data is decoded for consumption by clients, and thus is not a reflection of the amount of work being done by scanners.

metrics.name: scanner_rows_scanned
metrics.label: Scanner Rows Scanned
metrics.description: Number of rows processed by scan requests. This is measured as a raw count prior to application of predicates, deleted data,or MVCC-based filtering. Thus, this is a better measure of actual table rows that have been processed by scan operations compared to the Scanner Rows Returned metric.

metrics.name: scanner_cells_scanned_from_disk
metrics.label: Scanner Cells Scanned From Disk
metrics.description:
Number of table cells processed by scan requests. This is measured as a raw count prior to application of predicates, deleted data,or MVCC-based filtering. Thus, this is a better measure of actual table cells that have been processed by scan operations compared to the Scanner Cells Returned metric.
Note that this only counts data that has been flushed to disk, and does not include data read from in-memory stores. However, itincludes both cache misses and cache hits.

metrics.name: scanner_bytes_scanned_from_disk
metrics.label: Scanner Bytes Scanned From Disk
metrics.description:
Number of bytes read by scan requests. This is measured as a raw count prior to application of predicates, deleted data,or MVCC-based filtering. Thus, this is a better measure of actual IO that has been caused by scan operations compared to the Scanner Bytes Returned metric.
Note that this only counts data that has been flushed to disk, and does not include data read from in-memory stores. However, itincludes both cache misses and cache hits.

metrics.name: insertions_failed_dup_key
metrics.label: Duplicate Key Inserts
metrics.description: Number of inserts which failed because the key already existed

metrics.name: scans_started
metrics.label: Scans Started
metrics.description: Number of scanners which have been started on this tablet

metrics.name: bloom_lookups
metrics.label: Bloom Filter Lookups
metrics.description: Number of times a bloom filter was consulted

metrics.name: key_file_lookups
metrics.label: Key File Lookups
metrics.description: Number of times a key cfile was consulted

metrics.name: delta_file_lookups
metrics.label: Delta File Lookups
metrics.description: Number of times a delta file was consulted

metrics.name: mrs_lookups
metrics.label: MemRowSet Lookups
metrics.description: Number of times a MemRowSet was consulted.

metrics.name: bytes_flushed
metrics.label: Bytes Flushed
metrics.description: Amount of data that has been flushed to disk by this tablet.

metrics.name: bloom_lookups_per_op
metrics.label: Bloom Lookups per Operation
metrics.description: Tracks the number of bloom filter lookups performed by each operation. A single operation may perform several bloom filter lookups if the tablet is not fully compacted. High frequency of high values may indicate that compaction is falling behind.

metrics.name: key_file_lookups_per_op
metrics.label: Key Lookups per Operation
metrics.description: Tracks the number of key file lookups performed by each operation. A single operation may perform several key file lookups if the tablet is not fully compacted and if bloom filters are not effectively culling lookups.

metrics.name: delta_file_lookups_per_op
metrics.label: Delta File Lookups per Operation
metrics.description: Tracks the number of delta file lookups performed by each operation. A single operation may perform several delta file lookups if the tablet is not fully compacted. High frequency of high values may indicate that compaction is falling behind.

metrics.name: write_op_duration_client_propagated_consistency
metrics.label: Write Op Duration with Propagated Consistency
metrics.description: Duration of writes to this tablet with external consistency set to CLIENT_PROPAGATED.

metrics.name: write_op_duration_commit_wait_consistency
metrics.label: Write Op Duration with Commit-Wait Consistency
metrics.description: Duration of writes to this tablet with external consistency set to COMMIT_WAIT.

metrics.name: commit_wait_duration
metrics.label: Commit-Wait Duration
metrics.description: Time spent waiting for COMMIT_WAIT external consistency writes for this tablet.

metrics.name: snapshot_read_inflight_wait_duration
metrics.label: Time Waiting For Snapshot Reads
metrics.description: Time spent waiting for in-flight writes to complete for READ_AT_SNAPSHOT scans.

metrics.name: flush_dms_running
metrics.label: DeltaMemStore Flushes Running
metrics.description: Number of delta memstore flushes currently running.

metrics.name: flush_mrs_running
metrics.label: MemRowSet Flushes Running
metrics.description: Number of MemRowSet flushes currently running.

metrics.name: compact_rs_running
metrics.label: RowSet Compactions Running
metrics.description: Number of RowSet compactions currently running.

metrics.name: delta_minor_compact_rs_running
metrics.label: Minor Delta Compactions Running
metrics.description: Number of delta minor compactions currently running.

metrics.name: delta_major_compact_rs_running
metrics.label: Major Delta Compactions Running
metrics.description: Number of delta major compactions currently running.

metrics.name: flush_dms_duration
metrics.label: DeltaMemStore Flush Duration
metrics.description: Time spent flushing DeltaMemStores.

metrics.name: flush_mrs_duration
metrics.label: MemRowSet Flush Duration
metrics.description: Time spent flushing MemRowSets.

metrics.name: compact_rs_duration
metrics.label: RowSet Compaction Duration
metrics.description: Time spent compacting RowSets.

metrics.name: delta_minor_compact_rs_duration
metrics.label: Minor Delta Compaction Duration
metrics.description: Time spent minor delta compacting.

metrics.name: delta_major_compact_rs_duration
metrics.label: Major Delta Compaction Duration
metrics.description: Seconds spent major delta compacting.

metrics.name: leader_memory_pressure_rejections
metrics.label: Leader Memory Pressure Rejections
metrics.description: Number of RPC requests rejected due to memory pressure while LEADER.

metrics.name: log_gc_running
metrics.label: Log GCs Running
metrics.description: Number of log GC operations currently running.

metrics.name: log_gc_duration
metrics.label: Log GC Duration
metrics.description: Time spent garbage collecting the logs.

metrics.name: op_prepare_queue_length
metrics.label: Operation Prepare Queue Length
metrics.description: Number of operations waiting to be prepared within this tablet. High queue lengths indicate that the server is unable to process operations as fast as they are being written to the WAL.

metrics.name: op_prepare_queue_time
metrics.label: Operation Prepare Queue Time
metrics.description: Time that operations spent waiting in the prepare queue before being processed. High queue times indicate that the server is unable to process operations as fast as they are being written to the WAL.

metrics.name: op_prepare_run_time
metrics.label: Operation Prepare Run Time
metrics.description: Time that operations spent being prepared in the tablet. High values may indicate that the server is under-provisioned or that operations are experiencing high contention with one another for locks.

metrics.name: all_transactions_inflight
metrics.label: Transactions In Flight
metrics.description: Number of transactions currently in-flight, including any type.

metrics.name: write_transactions_inflight
metrics.label: Write Transactions In Flight
metrics.description: Number of write transactions currently in-flight

metrics.name: alter_schema_transactions_inflight
metrics.label: Alter Schema Transactions In Flight
metrics.description: Number of alter schema transactions currently in-flight

metrics.name: transaction_memory_pressure_rejections
metrics.label: Transaction Memory Pressure Rejections
metrics.description: Number of transactions rejected because the tablet's transaction memory limit was reached.

metrics.name: majority_done_ops
metrics.label: Leader Operations Acked by Majority
metrics.description: Number of operations in the leader queue ack'd by a majority but not all peers. This metric is always zero for followers.

metrics.name: in_progress_ops
metrics.label: Operations in Progress
metrics.description: Number of operations in the peer's queue ack'd by a minority of peers.

metrics.name: log_cache_num_ops
metrics.label: Log Cache Operation Count
metrics.description: Number of operations in the log cache.

metrics.name: log_cache_size
metrics.label: Log Cache Memory Usage
metrics.description: Amount of memory in use for caching the local log.

metrics.name: follower_memory_pressure_rejections
metrics.label: Follower Memory Pressure Rejections
metrics.description: Number of RPC requests rejected due to memory pressure while FOLLOWER.

metrics.name: raft_term
metrics.label: Current Raft Consensus Term
metrics.description: Current Term of the Raft Consensus algorithm. This number increments each time a leader election is started.

metrics.name: log_reader_bytes_read
metrics.label: Bytes Read From Log
metrics.description: Data read from the WAL since tablet start

metrics.name: log_reader_entries_read
metrics.label: Entries Read From Log
metrics.description: Number of entries read from the WAL since tablet start

metrics.name: log_reader_read_batch_latency
metrics.label: Log Read Latency
metrics.description: Microseconds spent reading log entry batches

metrics.name: log_bytes_logged
metrics.label: Bytes Written to WAL
metrics.description: Number of bytes logged since service start

metrics.name: log_sync_latency
metrics.label: Log Sync Latency
metrics.description: Microseconds spent on synchronizing the log segment file

metrics.name: log_append_latency
metrics.label: Log Append Latency
metrics.description: Microseconds spent on appending to the log segment file

metrics.name: log_group_commit_latency
metrics.label: Log Group Commit Latency
metrics.description: Microseconds spent on committing an entire group

metrics.name: log_roll_latency
metrics.label: Log Roll Latency
metrics.description: Microseconds spent on rolling over to a new log segment file

metrics.name: log_entry_batches_per_group
metrics.label: Log Group Commit Batch Size
metrics.description: Number of log entry batches in a group commit group

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.UpdateConsensus RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.UpdateConsensus() RPC requests

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.RequestConsensusVote RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.RunLeaderElection RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.LeaderStepDown RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.GetLastOpId RPC Time

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.GetConsensusState RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.GetConsensusState() RPC requests

metrics.label: kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.StartTabletCopy RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.consensus.ConsensusService.StartTabletCopy() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_tserver_TabletServerAdminService_CreateTablet
metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.CreateTablet RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.CreateTablet() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_tserver_TabletServerAdminService_DeleteTablet
metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.DeleteTablet RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.DeleteTablet() RPC requests

metrics.name: handler_latency_kudu_tserver_TabletServerAdminService_AlterSchema
metrics.label: kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.AlterSchema RPC Time
metrics.description: Microseconds spent handling kudu.tserver.TabletServerAdminService.AlterSchema() RPC requests

metrics.name: rpc_connections_accepted
metrics.label: RPC Connections Accepted
metrics.description: Number of incoming TCP connections made to the RPC server

metrics.name: rpc_incoming_queue_time
metrics.label: RPC Queue Time
metrics.description: Number of microseconds incoming RPC requests spend in the worker queue

metrics.name: rpcs_timed_out_in_queue
metrics.label: RPC Queue Timeouts
metrics.description: Number of RPCs whose timeout elapsed while waiting in the service queue, and thus were not processed.

metrics.name: rpcs_queue_overflow
metrics.label: RPC Queue Overflows
metrics.description: Number of RPCs dropped because the service queue was full.

metrics.name: hybrid_clock_timestamp
metrics.label: Hybrid Clock Timestamp
metrics.description: Hybrid clock timestamp.

metrics.name: hybrid_clock_error
metrics.label: Hybrid Clock Error
metrics.description: Server clock maximum error.

metrics.name: logical_clock_timestamp
metrics.label: Logical Clock Timestamp
metrics.description: Logical clock timestamp.

metrics.name: code_cache_hits
metrics.label: Codegen Cache Hits
metrics.description: Number of codegen cache hits since start

metrics.name: code_cache_queries
metrics.label: Codegen Cache Queries
metrics.description: Number of codegen cache queries (hits + misses) since start

metrics.name: block_manager_blocks_open_reading
metrics.label: Data Blocks Open For Read
metrics.description: Number of data blocks currently open for reading

metrics.name: block_manager_blocks_open_writing
metrics.label: Data Blocks Open For Write
metrics.description: Number of data blocks currently open for writing

metrics.name: block_manager_total_writable_blocks
metrics.label: Data Blocks Opened For Write
metrics.description: Number of data blocks opened for writing since service start

metrics.name: block_manager_total_readable_blocks
metrics.label: Data Blocks Opened For Read
metrics.description: Number of data blocks opened for reading since service start

metrics.name: block_manager_total_bytes_written
metrics.label: Block Data Bytes Written
metrics.description: Number of bytes of block data written since service start

metrics.name: block_manager_total_bytes_read
metrics.label: Block Data Bytes Read
metrics.description: Number of bytes of block data read since service start

metrics.name: log_block_manager_bytes_under_management
metrics.label: Bytes Under Management
metrics.description: Number of bytes of data blocks currently under management

metrics.name: log_block_manager_blocks_under_management
metrics.label: Blocks Under Management
metrics.description: Number of data blocks currently under management

metrics.name: log_block_manager_containers
metrics.label: Number of Block Containers
metrics.description: Number of log block containers

metrics.name: log_block_manager_full_containers
metrics.label: Number of Full Block Counters
metrics.description: Number of full log block containers

metrics.name: log_block_manager_unavailable_containers
metrics.label: Number of Unavailable Log Block Containers
metrics.description: Number of non-full log block containers that are under root paths whose disks are full

metrics.name: block_cache_inserts
metrics.label: Block Cache Inserts
metrics.description: Number of blocks inserted in the cache

metrics.name: block_cache_lookups
metrics.label: Block Cache Lookups
metrics.description: Number of blocks looked up from the cache

metrics.name: block_cache_evictions
metrics.label: Block Cache Evictions
metrics.description: Number of blocks evicted from the cache

metrics.name: block_cache_misses
metrics.label: Block Cache Misses
metrics.description: Number of lookups that didn't yield a block

metrics.name: block_cache_misses_caching
metrics.label: Block Cache Misses (Caching)
metrics.description: Number of lookups that were expecting a block that didn't yield one.Use this number instead of cache_misses when trying to determine how efficient the cache is

metrics.name: block_cache_hits
metrics.label: Block Cache Hits
metrics.description: Number of lookups that found a block

metrics.name: block_cache_hits_caching
metrics.label: Block Cache Hits (Caching)
metrics.description: Number of lookups that were expecting a block that found one.Use this number instead of cache_hits when trying to determine how efficient the cache is

metrics.name: block_cache_usage
metrics.label: Block Cache Memory Usage
metrics.description: Memory consumed by the block cache

metrics.name: spinlock_contention_time
metrics.label: Spinlock Contention Time
metrics.description: Amount of time consumed by contention on internal spinlocks since the server started. If this increases rapidly, it may indicate a performance issue in Kudu internals triggered by a particular workload and warrant investigation.

metrics.name: tcmalloc_contention_time
metrics.label: TCMalloc Contention Time
metrics.description: Amount of time consumed by contention on tcmalloc's locks since the server started. If this increases rapidly, it may indicate a performance issue in Kudu internals triggered by a particular workload and warrant investigation.

metrics.name: threads_started
metrics.label: Threads Started
metrics.description: Total number of threads started on this server

metrics.name: threads_running
metrics.label: Threads Running
metrics.description: Current number of running threads

metrics.name: cpu_utime
metrics.label: User CPU Time
metrics.description: Total user CPU time of the process

metrics.name: cpu_stime
metrics.label: System CPU Time
metrics.description: Total system CPU time of the process

metrics.name: voluntary_context_switches
metrics.label: Voluntary Context Switches
metrics.description: Total voluntary context switches

metrics.name: involuntary_context_switches
metrics.label: Involuntary Context Switches
metrics.description: Total involuntary context switches
